title: New Jersey Firm Recalls Cobb and Spinach Salads Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 3, 2012 - F&S Produce Company Inc., a Deerfield, N.J. establishment, is recalling approximately 389 pounds of Cobb and spinach salads. The salads contain eggs that are the subject of a Food and Drug Administration (FDA) recall due to concerns about contamination with...
impacted_products: 10-oz. plastic containers of "Fresh Garden Highway Spinach Salad with Bacon"
10.75-oz plastic containers of "Fresh Garden Highway Cobb Salad"
